scripts.html-minifier: html-minifier --input-dir src --output-dir dist --file-ext html --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --minify-js true --minify-css true
scripts.build: copyfiles -u 1 src/css/*.css dist && copyfiles  -u 1 src/html/*.html dist && copyfiles  -u 1 src/media/*.png dist && copyfiles  -u 1 src/media/*.jpg dist
scripts.start: npm run prestart && npm run build && npm run html-minifier && node app.js
